Class.name: SmallBusinessTunables

TunableTuple.name: ALL_CUSTOMER_MATCHING_CRITERIA_ON_COOLDOWN_TNS
TunableTuple.display: All Customer Matching Criteria On Cooldown Tns
TunableTuple.description: TNS that is displayed when all customers matching all required criteria are on a cooldown ans can't attend.

TunableVariant.name: additional_texts
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, add additional text to the dialog

Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: anonymous_target_sim
Tunable.description: DEPRECATED! Please use custom_mask_target_sim instead. Use InGame/UI/Icons/Dialog/phone_anonymous_caller_icon.png and UI/Gameplay/Phone:UnknownCallerName. If this dialog is using a target sim id to give a conversation type view and this is checked, then the target sim icon will instead be replaced by an anonymous caller.

TunableVariant.name: audio_sting
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, play an audio sting when the dialog is shown.

Tunable.name: audio
Tunable.description: The sound to play.

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description: If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

TunableVariant.name: audio_sting_owner
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will set the owner of the audio sting when the dialog is shown.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant of the interaction who will play the audio_sting.

TunableEnum.name: auto_delete_reason

Tunable.description: The background audio event string.

TunableVariant.name: background_image
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, add a background image to the dialog. This will only be used in the case where dialog_bg_style is BG_DYNAMIC_IMAGE.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The background image for the family portrait.

TunableVariant.name: custom_mask_target_sim
TunableVariant.description: When tuned, display the given icon/name for the target Sim instead of the Sim's actual icon/name.

TunableTuple.description: Return all plants.

Tunable.name: BUSINESS_ENCOURAGEMENT_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to an interaction's final autonomy score in the case that a business rule encourages that action. This tunable has the responsibility of making sure Sims will not run encouraged interactions 100% of the time with no chance of normal things like solving motives, even if those actions are not encouraged.

Tunable.name: BUSINESS_ENCOURAGEMENT_SUBACTION_MULTIPLIER

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

TunableVariant.name: OFF_LOT_AUTONOMY_RULE
TunableVariant.description: The rules to apply for how autonomy handle on-lot and off-lot targets. DEFAULT: Off-lot sims who are outside the lot's tolerance will not autonomously perform interactions on the lot. Sims will only autonomously perform off-lot interactions within their off-lot radius. ON_LOT_ONLY: Sims will only consider targets on the active lot. SHARED_SPACE_ONLY: Sims will only consider targets on the shared space of active lot. OFF_LOT_ONLY: Sims will only consider targets that are off the active lot. UNLIMITED: Sims will consider all objects regardless of on/off lot status. FESTIVAL: Sims will consider all objects within the festival area. ANCHORED: Sims will only consider objects within a tuned radius of autonomy anchor objects. Anchor objects can be objects that match a tag, sims that match a buff, or set by external systems. BUSINESS_EMPLOYEE: Sims will not use objects that are in a Private Dynamic Area BUSINESS_CUSTOMER: Sims will not use objects that are in a Private Dynamic Area or Employee only Dynamic Area

TunableTuple.name: anchored
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider targets that are off the active lot.

TunableVariant.name: anchor_buff
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will set the autonomy anchor to all sims that match the tuned buff.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The buff in question.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

TunableVariant.name: buff_source
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

TunableVariant.name: anchor_tag
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will set the autonomy anchor to all objects that match the tuned tag.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The tag used to find an object to be an anchor.

Tunable.name: radius
Tunable.description: The radius around the anchoring point in which the sim will consider objects. This point must be set on the autonomy component. Designers: Please make sure this autonomy modifier is attached to a role or other other gameplay system that will correctly set the anchoring point before you set this. Or set the anchor tag on this tunable.

TunableTuple.name: business_customer
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider objects located in public area defined by dynamic areas.

TunableTuple.name: business_employee
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider objects located in public and employee only areas defined by dynamic areas.

TunableTuple.name: default_behavior
TunableTuple.description: Off-lot sims who are outside the lot's tolerance will not autonomously perform interactions on the lot. Sims will only autonomously perform off-lot interactions within their off-lot radius.

Tunable.name: radius
Tunable.description: The radius around the sim in which he will consider off-lot objects. If it is 0, the Sim will not consider off-lot objects at all. This is not recommended since it will keep them from running any interactions unless they are already within the tolerance for that lot (set with Off Lot Tolerance).

Tunable.name: tolerance
Tunable.description: This is how many meters the Sim can be off of the lot while still being considered on the lot for the purposes of autonomy. For example, if this is set to 5, the sim can be 5 meters from the edge of the lot and still consider all the objects on the lot for autonomy. If the sim were to step 6 meters from the lot, the sim would be considered off the lot and would only score off-lot objects that are within the off lot radius.

TunableTuple.name: off_lot_only
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider targets that are off the active lot.

Tunable.name: radius
Tunable.description: The radius around the sim in which he will consider off-lot objects. If it is 0, the Sim will not consider off-lot objects at all. This is not recommended since it will keep them from running any interactions unless they are already within the tolerance for that lot (set with Off Lot Tolerance).

TunableTuple.name: on_lot_only
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider targets on the active lot.

TunableTuple.name: restricted
TunableTuple.description: Sims will consider all objects in the restricted open street autonomy area. This is defined by points in world builder so please make sure that world builder has setup the objects before trying to use this option.

TunableTuple.name: shared_space_only
TunableTuple.description: Sims will only consider targets on the shared space/common space of active lot.

TunableTuple.name: unlimited
TunableTuple.description: Sims will consider all objects regardless of on/off lot status.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not.
